summary: Completed comprehensive testing of PVC Oferta SaaS application. All 15 backend API tests passed. Frontend UI tests verified: admin pricing management, registration page pricing display, and multi-item offers functionality.
seed_data_creation: Test customer 'TEST_MultiItem_Customer' and test offer with 3 items created during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All features working correctly. Admin pricing management updates packages dynamically. Registration page shows pricing packages. Multi-item offers (windows + doors) work correctly with proper price calculations. PDF download functional.

admin_pricing_management.details: Admin can change monthly price via input field. Package prices (1,3,6,12 months) recalculate automatically with correct discounts (0%, 10%, 20%, 30%)

registration_pricing_display.details: Registration page shows 'Paketat e Abonimit' section with all 4 pricing packages and discount badges

multi_item_offers.details: Offers support multiple items (windows and doors). Tested offer with 2 windows + 1 door. Price calculations include subtotal, discount, VAT correctly

admin_login.details: Admin login works with provided credentials. Admin panel shows stats, user management, and pricing management

pdf_download.details: PDF download returns valid PDF file (3026 bytes, application/pdf content type)

user_management.details: Admin can view users, activate/deactivate accounts, and delete users
